entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of thunderstorms. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 60 percent chance of showers over northern sections. Risk of thunderstorms early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023
